definition: surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: THE hurricane seeks the shortest road by the no-road.
sentences.chinese: 颶風藉以無路索求最短的行程。

sentences.english: This signal of youth is still base on require.
sentences.chinese: 這年輕的自我信號，依然是以索求爲主。

sentences.english: Our buyers asked for your price list or catalogue.
sentences.chinese: 我們的買主想索求貴方價格單或目錄。

sentences.english: This is something people have been asking for.
Happy people ask for what they need.
sentences.chinese: 快樂的人從不過多索求。

sentences.english: Don't ask for a bigger garden, ask only to be a better gardener.
sentences.chinese: 不要索求更大的花園，而要成爲更好的花匠。

definition: to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
to caress/to fondle/to look after (tenderly)/affectionate care
bottomless pit of desire (idiom); insatiable greed/carnal cravings are never satisfied and are a main obstruction on the path to enlightenment
to seek for/to hope to gain/desirous
to make extravagant demands/an unreasonable request
variant of 施與|施与[shi1 yu3]
